level.heading: Green building priority.
level.text: Priority consideration for the District government's facility needs shall be given to buildings fulfilling or exceeding the LEED-NC 2.2 standard or the LEED-CS 2.0 standard at the silver level. For purposes of this subsection, the terms "LEED-CS" and "LEED-NC" shall have the same meanings as provided in ยง 6-1451.01(28) and (30), respectively.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 1007 of Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2011 (D.C. Act 19-93, June 29, 2011, 58 DCR 5599).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-21
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under ยง 10-551.01
